name: Devil Hunter (Squirtle)
description:
Congenital generalized hypertrichosis (CGH), commonly known as "werewolf syndrome", is an extremely rare group of abnormalities in the growth of body hair. It is an extremely rare genetic disorder in which a person's body is covered in dark, hard hair shortly after birth, just like a werewolf in legendary stories, but the rest of the body is the same as a normal person's and the mental development is normal.

My game is based on this disease.

This game is mainly about the plot, there is not much actionable content, talk to different npc's on the map and you will find: the princess is outside the city, the princess is sick, the illness is rare and painful and will transform into a monster. So is that monster you killed the princess? The monster asked you to save her, but what did you do? Of course there is only one path inside the game, and the reversal of the game is something you have to go through.
